commit.message:
store-motion.c (remove_reachable_equiv_notes): Reformat long lines.

	* store-motion.c (remove_reachable_equiv_notes): Reformat long
	lines.  Use for (;;).

From-SVN: r247705

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@

+	lines.  Use for (;;).
